text: 3.18 Epe 4.15, 2 Ti 4.18, 1 Pi 2.2, Jud 25, Lep 1.6 Jisas Klays, ne Bɨawl chɨn ak mɨdɨl, bɨ kasɨn gep chɨn ak mɨdeb. Ne nɨbop pel yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gaknɨŋ, nop nepɨm. Nɨbop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gup anɨb ak, nɨbop gek jak kɨles gɨl yenɨmɨb. Nop nɨgtep gɨpɨm ak, nɨbi kɨles gɨl gem amek, nop nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨmɨb. Pen mɨñɨl nop yɨb awl ñɨnɨgun, pel pelnep abe ñɨlɨg yonɨgun. Yaw.
